channel.title: Face and Object Recognition Module for Co-Creation Space on TRACTION Toolset
channel.description: Recent content in Face and Object Recognition Module for Co-Creation Space on TRACTION Toolset

item.description: Installation Follow the instructions at https://pytorch.org/ to install PyTorch for your system using ether conda or pip. If you have a CUDA compatible graphics card, ensure to install a CUDA comparible version of PyTorch to allow the deep models to run on the GPU. To install the facerec package and facetool console script, run: pip install . This will install the facetool script on your environment path. Co-Creation Space Integration The facerecdb.

item.title: Face and Object Recognition Module for Co-Creation Space
item.description: Description The Face and Object Recognition Module for Co-Creation Space contains neural networks capable of generating automatic tags based on face and object recognition for content filtering in the Co-Creation Space. Deployment
